items.title: RFK Jr. singled out one study to cut funds for global vaccines. Is that study valid?

items.title: The White House took down the nation's top climate report. You can still find it here
items.description: The National Climate Assessment is the most influential source of information about climate change in the United States.

items.title: Waffle House drops egg surcharge as prices fall back to Earth
items.description: Waffle House has dropped its 50 cent surcharge on eggs as supplies rebound. The chain added the temporary charge in February, when avian flu sent egg ...

items.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart dies at age 90
items.description: Jimmy Swaggart, one of the most well-known televangelists of the 1980s, has died, according to a social media post from his ministry.
